Adequate footwear

These trainers feel cheap, luckily i bough them to use purely indoors with my Spin bike and for that they feel fit for purpose, and im sure they will be fine for that purpose, but if i was going to use these as running shoes, i would go for a branded pair and pay more, I'm not really sure why these trainers have received so many 5 star reviews, they are more like lace up beach shoes, they don't even have a separate tongue, when you lace them up tight you are dragging in the material of the shoes into a lump on the top of your foot, even though they were pretty cheap I was expecting a bit more quality for the price..they are perfectly adequate for casual or indoor wear, but i don't think they would last long if used for outdoor sports/fitnessif i had purchased these trainers for running outdoors i would probably be returning them for a full refund and just accepted that i will have to pay more money for a better quality branded pair of running shoes.
